segments.text: My attention shifts to the left, where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a two-step stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, almost fully extended towards the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly wobbly beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see its legs are splayed, tilting precariously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over at any second, sending him sprawling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has one hand in the jar, retrieving cookies, and a plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried he's going to fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is reaching up, clearly expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s surprising how much daring is packed into this small moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookies, he probably doesn't realize the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR
